content: skill level pineapple fruit intermediate gauge with 3 25 mm hook 5 single_crochet sts & 6 row = 1 inch © 2020 yarn blossom boutique all rights reserved it is illegal to copy redistribute sell or share this pattern or any of its parts for any information please contact orders@yarnblossomboutique com actual finished product may be sold i just ask that you please include my shop name when selling finished product thank you materials needed abbreviations worsted / aran weight yarn in colors blo- back loops only dark yellow light yellow and green chain s - chain s 3 25 mm hook double_crochet- double_crochet fiberfill stuffing flo- front loops only yarn needle half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet stitch marker round- round 2 9 mm safety eyes repeat- repeat single_crochet- single_crochet decrease- single_crochet 2 stitches together skip- skip measurements slip_stitch- slip_stitch 7 1/2 inches tall by 4 inches wide spsc- single_crochet spike stitch st s - stitch es yo- yarn over notes from * until end of round 30 total sts round 6 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat -the at the end of each round states from * until end of round 36 total sts the total number of stitches that should round 7 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts repeat be completed for that round -gauge is not critical for this project you from * until end of round 42 total sts can use any yarn to make this amigurumi round 8 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts repeat -to make a spsc single_crochet spike stitch from * until end of round 48 total sts insert your hook in the next stitch one round 9 *skip next 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st skip round below yarn over and pull loop up to next 2 sts single_crochet in next st repeat from * 8 times the level of the current round yarn over and pull yarn through both loops on hook total 48 total sts round 10 change to dark yellow yarn single_crochet in each st around 48 total sts change to light pineapple yellow yarn slip_stitch in next 2 sts round 11 *single_crochet in next st skip next 2 sts 5 double_crochet in with 3 25 mm hook and light yellow next st skip next 2 sts repeat from * 8 times yarn chain 2 total 48 total sts slip_stitch in next st round 12 change to dark yellow yarn *single_crochet round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 total sts in next 5 sts spsc in next st repeat from * round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 total sts 8 times total 48 total sts change to light round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st repeat yellow yarn slip_stitch in next 2 sts from * until end of round 18 total sts round 13 repeat round 11 round 4 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next
